lead_paragraph: The move expanded Argentina’s territory in the South Atlantic Ocean by 35 percent to include the disputed Falkland Islands and beyond.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Argentina: U.N. Decision Expands Maritime Territory
headline.main: Argentina: U.N. Decision Expands Maritime Territory

snippet: The move expanded Argentina’s territory in the South Atlantic Ocean by 35 percent to include the disputed Falkland Islands and beyond.
abstract: United Nations Commission on the Limits of the Continental Shelf sides with Argentina and expands nation's maritime territory in South Atlantic Ocean by 35 percent, including disputed Falkland Islands; decision acknowledges unresolved diplomatic dispute between Britain and Argentina over islands.
